Well, it was her job as a mother to pamper him as much as possible now that he was still around. She bit her lip, suddenly noticing her own reflection. The fact that he was a young stud in his prime had nothing to do with it.

She remembered the last time she had seen him completely naked. It was 2 months ago, during a random laundry round-up. He had grown so much, down there. His body was just... perfect. She had spent the rest of the afternoon fingering, snacking on his dirty underwear like trail-mix.

Now was her chance. They were home alone, the rain was pouring and there was nothing to do but each other. She readjusted her dress and went up to his room. Taking a few slow breaths before knocking on his door, she repeated her mantra in thought, I always get what I want.

He answered...
115.title: Version 5

1151.content:
She found Walter sitting hunched on the bed, wearing his sports outfit. He looked ahead, as if frightened by something at the end of his bed.

"Hey honey. What's wrong?" She said with an edge of concern, sitting down on the edge of the bed.

"I~ I just ate someone." He said, half to tears.

Winter swallowed in relief. That meant it was time to have the talk. She contained her excitement at this perfect opportunity, and instead put a comforting hand on his knee.

"Who did you eat, dear?" She said levelly?

"It... it was Tim, you know, Tim Thompson from three houses over. We were just goofing around and then I ate him." He exhaled deeply, as if lifting a burden with the confession.

"It's OK, honey." Winter patted his leg, moving closer to embrace him. "Did anybody see you?"

""No, it was here." He answered quickly. "I don't think anybody knows he was here anyway."

"Ok good. Now you need to know it's very natural what you did. There's nothing wrong with it, OK?" She stroked a finger through his hair, whispering in his ear. "It's just a little something that's special about our family."

"You know what?" He said, squeezing her tight. "It felt kinda great."

Winter sighed happily. What to do now? Be the responsible mother, or have herself some fun out of this.
1151.title: "Come in"

choices: He walks around the neighborhood, looking for prey
He invites a friend over for 'dinner'
He goes to the park to find someone to eat
He goes elsewhere to find people to eat
He proudly shows his mother what he's done
13.content:
Today had been a strange day for Walter. He'd not expected to find himself with a huge swollen gut, filled with another person. His parents always teased him that once he'd be big enough, he could eat people too. But now that he'd finally achieved it, he didn't know what to think of it. He pats his belly as the struggles within slowly begin to subside. He didn't even know his victim, just a stranger that had come knocking when nobody else was home. He seemed kind enough, but the moment Walter had laid eyes on him, he knew that man belonged in his belly.

How Walter or his family ever became capable of these feats was unknown. Just a few months ago they were as average as one could imagine. His mother had been the first to discover something had changed. After devouring the mailman whole she became insatiable. She also quickly learned that her mouth wasn't the only part of her body ready to consume people. Both his parents took to their new abilities like they'd never been a day without them. The bodycount rose almost every day to the point where Walter stopped keeping track. How nobody had come looking for anyone yet was a mystery. But now that he'd experienced firsthand what it felt like to have someone squirming in his belly the student didn't care anymore. He was going to keep doing this.

Though perhaps not right now, as the swollen gut forced the young man to stay down, sitting next to his bed. He could feel his prey slowly falling still, but the sheer mass of his gut full of food was enough to keep him pinned. Hopefully a few of these big meals would help him build up his strength enough to carry wiggling prey around. Already he wasn't just fantasizing about carrying people in his belly as he digested them. He imagined all the things he could do to his victims, knowing they'd never be able to say a thing after he'd eaten them. He fell asleep sat against his bed and woke the next day to find himself a different man.

His limbs had thickened, enriched with muscle and fat. His belly too had ballooned a little. He certainly felt a little pudgy, but far more importantly, he felt hungry. His stomach yearned to experience living prey again.
13.title: Walter Wallace

134.content:
Wallace wanted to experience the same thing again, so he got dressed himself and went somewhere to find the prey for his experience. as he walked through the street he noticed a young female around his age and he grinned and he approached her. the female noticed him and wondered what he wanted and asked him the question,

"can I help you?" female asked.

"yeah, get into my belly!" Wallace spoke.

he grabbed her arm and started to swallow her down, the female were in fear and called for help but nobody came as half hour went by wallace swallowed the girl up whole, he felt the stomach growl and kicking, making him feel the pleasure from it,

what will he do now?
134.title: fattning up

1341.content:
Wallace goes home. Once at home he goes to his room, and locks the door. He walks over to his bed, and unbuttons his jeans. "Hey in there!" He pokes his belly. "I know you're in agony in there," he grins, "and I've decided to make it worse by fapping one off in your honor!"

Faint screams came from his stomach...
1341.title: he go home

1342.content:
The girl in his belly was thin as a reed, that wouldn't do for a growing boy like Walter. He chuckled to himself as he gave his belly a mighty squeeze. That big gut was aching for more. He kept wandering, already impressed by how little the squirming meal in his belly was slowing him. It's a good thing he wore his favorite tracksuit, because he already felt himself swell up a little. His perspective felt weird as he gained a few inches in size. It wasn't much, but it felt like a whole new view on the world for him. What really excited him was the possibilities. If he kept stuffing his belly, how long until he could eat two people per meal, or maybe even three? Not to mention all the things he could do to people that he would catch. If he grew as big and strong as he wanted, they'd become his playthings. Toys to have fun with before he'd eat them.

With and excited spring in his step he walked to the edge of his neighborhood. It wasn't very far and along the outskirts of town. Here he went and walked along the old hiking trail. Secluded in the woods, nobody would see what he was about to do to the hikers that occasionally ran down the path. But he couldn't just stand there with his arms open, waiting for prey. He needed a ruse, and he quickly came up with a simple but effective plan.

He sat his fat butt down alongside the trail, panting loudly. The squirming girl in his belly had already stopped. He couldn't even tell if there was anything left of her. A good thing, since the first hiker that showed up was on the pudgy side. Walter buried his face in his hands and kept breathing deeply and loudly. When the hiking girl came closer she stopped, curious to see the fat boy sitting there. Was he crying?

"Are... are you okay?" She asked. Even her voice sounded pudgy, making Walter's act that much harder to pull off.

"Y... Yeah, just really tired. But I'm already feeling better now that you're here."

"Hehe, thank you."

Walter slowly got on his feet again as the girl patted him on the shoulder and encouraged him.

"That's the spirit, you can do it." The hungry Walter could barely contain his giggling. He was certainly going to 'do it', but she probably meant something different.

"Thanks..." He said, awkwardly opening his arms. With a nervous smile she gave him the hug he was expecting, only to find his arms wrap around her tightly.

"Hey, what the- whoah!" She yelled as he lifted her off her feet and threw her on the ground. Before she could move a muscle he was on her, jumping up and smashing his big butt down on her. She cried out in pain. Though she was a little husky herself, Walter easily doubled her width and all that extra weight was now smothering her torso and head. To add insult to injury he ground his large buttcheeks back and forth over her, easily subduing her weak struggles. Her arms and legs flailed around, desperate to inflict some damage and convince those large buttcheeks squashing her to leave. But Walter was all too happy to stay seated, only lifting his butt ever so slightly to bring it crashing down again.

The hiker began to feel lightheaded, her face completely smothered by the large, flabby buttcheek of her attacker. But just before she would pass out he stood up. Her vision was blurry and her body exhausted. All she could see was Walter's wide open mouth descending on her. She squirmed as best she could, but it did nothing to slow her journey into his belly. With loud gulps he swallowed her pudgy form up and afterwards he stumbled to the nearest tree for a well-earned nap. She barely even put up a fight against his overwhelming belly. With a content smirk he began to digest his new prey.

When he awoke his belly felt empty again and his body had grown even fatter. He felt stronger than ever before, those flabby arms hiding powerful muscles. The sun was already setting, he'd need to make his way home soon. But there was still enough time for another hiker, right? Walter couldn't resist his urges. He was feeling...
1342.title: look for more prey

choices: Take the baby to the police station- they'll deal with it
Take the baby home with him- asks his mother for advice
Leave the baby there- they'll be alright
Leave him st a trusted friend or an orphanage
13421.content:
"...HUNGRY!" He cackled with devious joy as he felt the urge to feast again. He looked across the street, spotting a beautiful lady who was pushing a stroller. The woman was definitely a MILF with a supple body and a cute but mature face. She had big D cup knockers which sagged slightly in the sports bra she wore and strutted her perfectly sculpted butt with casual elegance.

She was currently trying to calm her child inside the stroller. She sighed and leaned over the child, giving Walter a clear view of her gorgeous cleavage. "Come on, Willy. Stop crying for the love of God! What is it? You hungry? Fine."

She plucked the child out of the stroller and placed him on her chest. She pulled up one of the straps of her bra and proceeded to breastfeed the baby, much to the delight of both little Willy and Walter. "You are just... PERFECT!" Walter giggled maniacally as he strolled up to the lady.

"Aw, that's such a CUTE baby," Walter cooed as he stroked the boy's head. "Ha!" the woman scoffed. "Please, you've caught him on a GOOD day! He won't stop yelling, 24-7! He's a right pain in the ass!" She looked up at Walter from the breastfeeding, showing two sparkling sapphire eyes. "Sorry about that, I was just venting my frustrations..."

"No worries, ma'am, I don't mind- I'd listen to a lovely woman like you telling me about herself any day of the week..." She blushed a bright shade of scarlet and punched Walter's arm playfully. "Stop flattering me! Gosh! I'm Jenna by the way."

"Walter. As I was saying,I'd listen to a lovely woman like you telling me about herself ANY DAY of the week... Which makes it all the worse that I have to do this," he continued. Jenna looked perplexed for a second before Walter unhinged his jaw, swallowing her whole like a boa constrictor.

"Mm... What a nice woman... She was a hell of a tasty snack..." Walter licked his lips and turned to walk away. He stopped abruptly when he heard the baby's coo. Instead of crying and being scared, he reached out to Walter, stretching his chunky marshmallow fingers out to him.

Suddenly, a realisation dawned upon Walter- he'd swallowed this baby's mother with no thought of what would happen to the child and who would take care of them. In the end he decided to:
13421.title: ...hungry
